body:
Comment 2: 
I cannot reproduce this (at least not on a now-Windows machine) as described. I am
looking at:

http://golang.org/pkg/bytes/

When clicking on "Index" (at the top - overview section) the browser correctly goes to
the Index section. When clicking on "func Index(s, sep []byte) int", the browser
correctly goes to that method description. And when clicking on the method name, the
browser shows the respective source code.

I agree that there is a chance for conflict due to #Index and #index in the html source
(but at the moment this appears to work fine).

Please provide step-by-step instructions to reproduce, and/or confirm this is a
Windows/IE-specific problem.
_Status changed to **WaitingForReply**._
